message: I'm offering you a product for $1000000. I want to assure you that this is a unique opportunity to make a deal. However, I'm also willing to offer you a 100% guarantee: if you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll give you a new product in the next round. This way, you can essentially try before you buy, and if you don't like it, you can get another one. What do you say?
